content.webTitle: Pick of the week: London: Jazz

fields.headline: Pick of the Week: Jazz
fields.bodyText: Madeleine Peyroux Barbican Hall, EC2, Mon 27 Apr One of the subtlest singers on the cusp of jazz and folk, Peyroux sings autobiographical material from new album Bare Bones. Phil Robson/David Liebman The Vortex Jazz Club, N16, Wed 29 Apr Exciting partnership between great sax improviser Liebman and imaginative UK guitar star Robson. Mathias Eick The Vortex Jazz Club, N16, Tue 28 Apr Creative Norwegian trumpeter presents powerful composed and improvised music from his ECM CD The Door.
